statements: UPDATE inventory_tracking SET current_stock = 50, last_updated = NOW() WHERE product_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET critical_stock_threshold = 10, product_name = 'New Product Name' WHERE product_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890';
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET current_stock = current_stock - 5, last_updated = NOW() WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET current_stock = current_stock + 10, critical_stock_threshold = 50 WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%'
UPDATE inventory SET product_name='Laptop', quantity_in_stock=100, last_update='2022-01-15 10:00:00' WHERE product_id=123;
UPDATE product_availability SET available_quantity=50, last_update='2022-01-20 12:30:00' WHERE availability_id=456;
UPDATE inventory SET product_name = 'Updated Product Name', quantity_in_stock = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE product_availability SET available_quantity = 50, last_update = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE location_id = 1 AND product_id = 2;
UPDATE products SET price = 45.50 WHERE product_id = '1ef1d20c-5812-493f-9374-9c0ba0c501b5';
UPDATE inventory SET in_stock = 100, last_updated = '2022-01-20 08:30:00' WHERE product_id = '1ef1d20c-5812-493f-9374-9c0ba0c501b5' AND warehouse_id = '54a81a71-0b5c-4ac8-915e-4e3eeb4a37c4';
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.10, quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE product_id = 'd18e08ec-6f0d-477e-95a0-935326b42f8b';
UPDATE inventory SET in_stock = in_stock + 10, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE product_id = 'f1a21358-9094-4f6b-8e2c-d1c9f5370b84' AND warehouse_id = 'a39f0d08-47af-4fef-9dc1-9d367d24a104';
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE ProductAvailability SET available_quantity = 50, last_updated = '2022-10-15' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 20, product_name = 'Updated Product' WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE ProductAvailability SET available_quantity = 50, last_updated = '2023-05-15 12:30:00' WHERE product_id = 456 AND location_id = 789;
UPDATE inventory SET stock_quantity = 50 WHERE product_name = 'Chair';
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_number = '1234567890' WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
UPDATE inventory SET stock_quantity = 1000, last_updated = NOW() WHERE product_name = 'Laptop'
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', contact_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers'
